# tag class

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/simulation/tags/tag
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:47:48.658125

---

A single gameplay tag, which represents a hierarchical name of the form x.y that is registered in the GameplayTagsManager You can filter the gameplay tags displayed in the editor.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/Simulation/Tags }` |

## Members

This class has no members.
